issue.title: [R] Allow rename Table and RecordBatch columns with names()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10522](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10522). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Allow R users to rename columns in `Table` and `RecordBatch` objects using `names(obj) <- value` syntax.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10522?focusedCommentId=17230290) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8643
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8643>
